segment.source: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server
segment.target: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server

segment.source: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server
segment.target: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server

segment.source: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server
segment.target: Moving MBAM 2.5 Features to Another Server

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 enables you to move the databases, Reports feature, and the websites to another server.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 enables you to move the databases, Reports feature, and the websites to another server.

segment.source: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Databases
segment.target: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Databases

segment.source: This topic explains how to move the Compliance and Audit Database (or Audit Database, if you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology) and the Recovery Database.
segment.target: This topic explains how to move the Compliance and Audit Database (or Audit Database, if you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology) and the Recovery Database.

segment.source: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Reports
segment.target: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Reports

segment.source: This topic explains how to move the Reports to another server.
segment.target: This topic explains how to move the Reports to another server.

segment.source: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Websites
segment.target: How to Move the MBAM 2.5 Websites

segment.source: This topic explains how to move the Administration and Monitoring Website and Self-Service Portal to another server.
segment.target: This topic explains how to move the Administration and Monitoring Website and Self-Service Portal to another server.

segment.source: Other resources for moving MBAM features
segment.target: Other resources for moving MBAM features
